members.name: 施宏政
members.intro: Received the B.S. degree and the M.S. degree in the Department of Computer Science from National Chiao Tung University, Hsinchu, Taiwan, in 1997 and 2002. He is currently a Ph.D. student in the Department of Computer Science, National Chiao Tung University. His research interests include mobile computing, wireless Internet, and power management.

members.name: 徐逸懷
members.intro: Received the B.S. degree in the Department of Computer and Information Science from the National Taichung University, Taichung, Taiwan, in 2008. He is currently an M.S. student in the Department of Computer Science, National Chiao Tung University. His research interest include wireless multimedia sensor networks.

102th.intro: Received the B.S. degree in the Department of Mathematics from the National Cheng Kung University in 2013. He is currently an M.S. student in the Department of Computer Science, National Chiao Tung University. His research interest includes cloud computing.

102th.name: Hendy Mizuardy
102th.intro: Received Bachelor Degree in the Department of Electrical Engineering from Syiah Kuala University in Aceh, Indonesia in 2006, and has working experience in IT project implementation for industry. His goals to be an M.S student in the Department of Computer Science, National Chiao Tung University are to broaden knowledge and to support working experience. His research interest includes Software Defined Networking.

Her research interests in Cloud Computing and Cloud Security.

98th.intro: Received the B.S. degree in computer engineering from the Yuan-Ze University, Taiwan, in 2009. He is currently an Master in the Department of Computer Science, National Chiao Tung University. His research interest include cloud computing.

98th.name: 蔡禮陽
98th.intro: Received the B.S. degree in Computer Science and Information from the Tam Kang University, Taiwan, in 2009. He is currently a graduate student in the Department of Computer Science, N ational Chiao Tung University. He is a researcher in Mobile Computing and Broadband Networking Laboratory and also a part-timer in National Center for High-Performance Computing now about developing the network programs. His research interests include network security (Botnet) and wireless sensor network.
